channel.title: All Registered Polls for the House of Commons
channel.description: All Registered Polls for the House of Commons

item.title: Opinion Poll by Ipsos MORI for Evening Standard, 11–18 September 2020 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Conservative Party: 37.8–43.9%
  • Labour Party: 34.9–40.9%
  • Liberal Democrats: 6.6–10.1%
  • Scottish National Party: 4.8–7.8%
  • Plaid Cymru: 0.5–1.8%
  • Green Party: 2.9–5.4%
